00029 template <typename Derived>
00030 class ExpressionBase {
00031 public:
00033     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Derived>::Element Element;
00035     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Derived>::ND ND;
00037     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Derived>::Iterator Iterator;
00039     typedef typename ExpressionTraits<Derived>::Reference Reference;

00046 
00048     Reference operator[](int n) const { return getSelf().operator[](n); }
00049 
00051     Reference front() const { return this->operator[](0); }
00052 
00054     Reference back() const { return this->operator[](this->template getSize<0>()-1); }

00077     typedef Reference const_reference;

00079     typedef int difference_type;
00080     typedef int size_type;
00081 
00083     size_type size() const { return this->template getSize<0>(); }
00084 
00086     bool empty() const { return this->template getSize<0>() == 0; }
